Posts.Content: First time poster, almost 3 weeks out from davinci. Would welcome some feedback on incontinence and how long it took folks. Given my age I was hoping to be out of the diapers quickly but at almost 3 weeks I continue to leak heavily. Am able to make it through the night. Went back work last week(I sit at a desk) and doing the kegels. I know it is marathon and not a sprint. Hard to be patient. Been lurking for a couple of weeks, have found the forum very helpful/informative. Thanks, Brian
Posts.Signature: Age: 35 PSA Trend: 2011-1.1, 2012-1.4, 2013-1.69, 2014-2.2, DEC2014-2.7 Family History: paternal grandfather, uncle and father all battled PC Biopsy: 12/24/14, 1/16 with Gleason(3+3) 6 Davinci 6: 2/5/15 at USMD in Arlington, TX
